forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 8am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 91 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 102. South wind 1 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
